name: Not eXactly C Source Code File
summary: Learn about .NXC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NXC is a high-level language that is similar to C and is built on top of the Next Byte Codes (NBC) compiler.

description: Source code file written in the Not eXactly C (NXC) programming language; may be used to program a LEGO Mindstorms NXT brick; can be opened with Bricx Command Center (BricxCC) to view the code with syntax highlighting; can also be viewed with a basic text editor.
